waterhole.commonlibs.net.download

Class BaseDownloadTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • waterhole.commonlibs.net.download.BaseDownloadTask<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class BaseDownloadTask<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    抽象下载任务，利用HttpClient进行下载，可以获取下载字节数和百分比。
    See Also:
    HttpProgressListener, handleProgress(long, long)
